Posts.Content: My doctor has recommended that I begin taking Aromasin because my breast cancer was hormone-fed.  Is there anyone taking it who has had a good response to it?  I'm really concerned, especially with the weight gain possibility and the joint pains.
Posts.Title: Any good reports on taking Aromasin?

Posts.Content: Thank you for your response.  Sounds like things are really going well for you - congratulations!  My biggest concern with Aromasin is the possibility of excessive weight gain - sounds like that hasn't been a problem for you and that gives me some encouragement.  Best to you in your continued treatment.
Posts.Title: Any good reports on taking Aromasin?
